description: This file defines the Home component for a React frontend, rendering a welcoming UI with buttons that trigger logging and feature flag checks. It imports common UI components, a logger, an API client, and feature flag utilities.

methods.name: Home()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the homepage with welcome message and action buttons.

methods.name: onGetStarted
methods.description: Async handler for the 'Get Started' button; logs an info message and makes a health check API request.

methods.name: onExplore
methods.description: Handler for the 'Explore' button; checks if the exploreV2 feature is enabled and logs the flag status.
